类 ReversiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReversiController

  • public class ReversiController
extends java.lang.Object
    作者:
    wenkaizheng this class is designed for all controlling the model it takes one model as parameter and do something for it it will be called by main and using for interact with model

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      char ComC 
      char HumC 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ReversiController(ReversiModel mo)
      simply constructor to accept model

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int black_score()
      this one used for calculating the black score which will interact with model
      void check_input(java.lang.String coordinate)
      this method will check the input if the length is not exact 2 , we throws the exception if the input with invalid position , we throws exception if this position can not be placed, we throws the exception if it is valid , we will call humanTurn to execute it;
      int checkAllPossible(int judge)
      this method to check if there are some place left or not go through all position and see if it is work or not
      int computerTurn()
      this method will check the all possible spot for computer the check method won't complete capture this time just find the valid place, and we record the max score and position, we used it for check method again, this time the check method not only check but also complete capture and we pass the right message to x and y for give user information
      java.lang.String getComputerDone()
      this one return the current message which include where will the computer to place
      int humanTurn(int row, int col)
      this method will check four direction if one position is valid check will complete the capture process after that we just put the chess into that position
      java.lang.String show_image()
      this method interact with model
      int white_score()
      this one used for calculating the white score which will interact with model

    • 方法详细资料

      • white_score

        public int white_score()
        this one used for calculating the white score which will interact with model
        返回:
        the score

      • black_score

        public int black_score()
        this one used for calculating the black score which will interact with model
        返回:
        the score

      • getComputerDone

        public java.lang.String getComputerDone()
        this one return the current message which include where will the computer to place
        返回:
        the message

      • check_input

        public void check_input(java.lang.String coordinate)
                 throws InvalidInputException,
                        InvalidMoveException
        this method will check the input if the length is not exact 2 , we throws the exception if the input with invalid position , we throws exception if this position can not be placed, we throws the exception if it is valid , we will call humanTurn to execute it;
        参数:
        coordinate - from view
        抛出:
        InvalidInputException - if there is some invalid input
        InvalidMoveException - if there is some invalid move

      • humanTurn

        public int humanTurn(int row,
                     int col)
        this method will check four direction if one position is valid check will complete the capture process after that we just put the chess into that position
        参数:
        row - from check_input
        col - from check_input
        返回:
        whether this position is good or not

      • computerTurn

        public int computerTurn()
        this method will check the all possible spot for computer the check method won't complete capture this time just find the valid place, and we record the max score and position, we used it for check method again, this time the check method not only check but also complete capture and we pass the right message to x and y for give user information
        返回:
        whether this position is good or not

      • checkAllPossible

        public int checkAllPossible(int judge)
        this method to check if there are some place left or not go through all position and see if it is work or not
        参数:
        judge - complete the capture or not
        返回:
        whether possible or not

      • show_image

        public java.lang.String show_image()
        this method interact with model
        返回:
        a string to represent the model
